Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Convenience property to return all tile layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Convenience property to return all object groups.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.name: imageLayers
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Convenience property to return all image layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.name: groupLayers
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Convenience property to return all group layers.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.name: antialiasLines
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Global antialiasing of lines

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.name: tileCount
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Global tile count

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.name: isPaused
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Pauses the node, and colors all of its children darker.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:ZFC7SKTiled9SK.name: load(fromFile:delegate:withTilesets:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:ZFC7SKTiled9SK.abstract: Load a Tiled tmx file and return a new SKTilemap object. Returns nil if there is a problem reading the file

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: init(attributes:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Initialize with dictionary attributes from xml parser.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: init(_:_:_:_:orientation:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Initialize with map size/tile size

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: addTileset(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Add a tileset to tileset set.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: removeTileset(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Remove a tileset from the tilesets.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getTileset(named:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a named tileset from the tilesets set.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getTileset(fileNamed:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns an external tileset with a given filename.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: pointForCoordinate(coord:offsetX:offsetY:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a point for a given coordinate in the layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: coordinateForPoint(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a tile coordinate for a given point in the layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: allLayers()
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns all layers, sorted by index (first is lowest, last is highest).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: layerNames()
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns an array of layer names.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: addLayer(_:base:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Add a layer to the layers set. Automatically sets zPosition based on the zDeltaForLayers attributes.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: removeLayer(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Remove a layer from the current layers set.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: addNewTileLayer(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Create and add a new tile layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getLayer(named:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a named tile layer from the layers set.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getLayer(withID:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a layer matching the given UUID.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getLayer(atIndex:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a layer given the index (0 being the lowest).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getLayers(ofType:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Return layers of the given type.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: isolateLayer(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Isolate a named layer (hides other layers). Pass nil

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: tileLayer(named:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a named tile layer if it exists, otherwise, nil.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: tileLayer(atIndex:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a tile layer at the given index, otherwise, nil.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: objectGroup(named:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a named object group if it exists, otherwise, nil.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: objectGroup(atIndex:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns an object group at the given index, otherwise, nil.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: indexOf(layedNamed:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns the index of a named layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: sortLayers(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Sort the layers in z based on a starting value (defaults to the current zPosition).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: tilesAt(coord:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Return tiles at the given coordinate (all tile layers).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: tilesAt(_:_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Return tiles at the given coordinate (all tile layers).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: tileAt(coord:inLayer:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a tile at the given coordinate from a layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: tileAt(_:_:inLayer:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a tile at the given coordinate from a layer.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getTiles(ofType:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns tiles with a property of the given type (all tile layers).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getTiles(withID:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns tiles matching the given gid (all tile layers).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getTilesWithProperty(_:_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns tiles with a property of the given type & value (all tile layers).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getTileData(withProperty:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Return tile data with a property of the given type (all tile layers).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getTileData(_:_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Return tile data with a property of the given type (all tile layers).

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getAnimatedTiles()
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns an array of all animated tile objects.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: firstTileAt(coord:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Return the top-most tile at the given coordinate.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getObjects()
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Return all of the current tile objects.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getObjects(ofType:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Return objects matching a given type.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getObjects(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Return objects matching a given name.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: getTileData(_:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns data for a global tile id.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: positionInMap(point:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns a positing in negative-y space.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: didFinishParsing(timeStarted:tasks:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Called when parser has finished reading the map.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: didFinishRendering(timeStarted:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Called when parser has finished rendering the map.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: gridGraphForLayers(_:diagonalsAllowed:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Initialize the grid graph with an array layer names.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: gridGraphForLayers(_:walkable:diagonalsAllowed:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Initialize the grid graph with an array of walkable tiles.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: gridGraphForLayers(_:walkableTypes:diagonalsAllowed:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Initialize the grid graph with an array of walkable tile types.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: gridGraphForLayers(_:walkableIDs:diagonalsAllowed:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Initialize the grid graph with an array of walkable tiles.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: parseProperties(completion:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Parse properties from the Tiled TMX file.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.name: tileWidth
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns the current tile width

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.name: tileHeight
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Returns the current tile height

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.name: debugDraw
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:vC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Visualize the current grid & bounds.

Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.name: debugLayers(reverse:)
Classes/SKTilemap.html#/s:FC7SKTiled9SKT.abstract: Output a summary of the current scenes layer data.

Classes/SKTilemap.html.name: SKTilemap
Classes/SKTilemap.html.abstract: The SKTilemap class represents a container which manages layers, tiles (sprites), vector objects & images.

Classes/SKTilemapParser.html.name: SKTilemapParser
Classes/SKTilemapParser.html.abstract: The SKTilemapParser is a custom XMLParserDelegate parser for reading Tiled TMX and tileset TSX files.

Classes/SKTileset.html.name: SKTileset
Classes/SKTileset.html.abstract: The SKTileset class manages a set of SKTilesetData objects, which store tile data including global id and texture.

Classes/SKTilesetData.html.name: SKTilesetData
Classes/SKTilesetData.html.abstract: The SKTilesetData object stores data for a single tileset tile, referencing the

Classes/TiledLayerObject.html.name: TiledLayerObject
Classes/TiledLayerObject.html.abstract: The TiledLayerObject is the base class for all SKTiled layer types. This class

Classes/SKTileLayer.html.name: SKTileLayer
Classes/SKTileLayer.html.abstract: The SKTileLayer class manages an array of tiles (sprites) that it renders as a single image.

Classes/SKObjectGroup.html.name: SKObjectGroup
Classes/SKObjectGroup.html.abstract: The SKObjectGroup object is a container that manages child vector objects that are drawn in the current coordinate space.

Classes/SKImageLayer.html.name: SKImageLayer
Classes/SKImageLayer.html.abstract: The SKImageLayer object is really nothing more than a sprite with positioning attributes.

Classes/SKGroupLayer.html.name: SKGroupLayer
Classes/SKGroupLayer.html.abstract: The SKGroupLayer object is a container for grouping other layers.

Classes/SKTile.html.name: SKTile
Classes/SKTile.html.abstract: Custom sprite type for rendering tile objects. Tile data (including texture) stored in SKTilesetData property.

Classes/SKTileObject.html.name: SKTileObject
Classes/SKTileObject.html.abstract: The SKTileObject object represents a Tiled object type (rectangle, ellipse, polygon & polyline).

Classes/SKTiledSceneCamera.html.name: SKTiledSceneCamera
Classes/SKTiledSceneCamera.html.abstract: Custom scene camera that responds to finger/mouse gestures.

Protocols/SKTiledSceneDelegate.html#/s:v.name: worldNode
Protocols/SKTiledSceneDelegate.html#/s:v.abstract: World container node. All Tiled assets are parented to this node.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:FE7S.name: didAddLayer(_:)
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:FE7S.abstract: Called when a layer is added to a tilemap.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:FE7S.name: didReadMap(_:)
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:FE7S.abstract: Called when the tilemap is finished parsing.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:FE7S.name: didRenderMap(_:)
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html#/s:FE7S.abstract: Called when the tilemap layers are finished rendering.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:vP7SKTil.name: uuid
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:vP7SKTil.abstract: Unique id (layer & object names may not be unique).

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:vE7SKTil.name: hasProperties
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:vE7SKTil.abstract: Returns true if the node has stored properties.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.name: hasKey(_:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.abstract: Returns true if the node has the given property.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.name: isNumber(_:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.abstract: Returns true if the value is a numeric type.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.name: setValue(forKey:_:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.abstract: Sets a named property. Returns the value, or nil if it does not exist.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.name: stringForKey(_:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.abstract: Returns a string for the given key.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.name: stringArrayForKey(_:separatedBy:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.abstract: Returns a string array for the given key.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.name: intForKey(_:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.abstract: Returns a integer value for the given key.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.name: integerArrayForKey(_:separatedBy:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.abstract: Returns a integer array for the given key.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.name: doubleForKey(_:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.abstract: Returns a float value for the given key.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.name: doubleArrayForKey(_:separatedBy:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.abstract: Returns a double array for the given key.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.name: boolForKey(_:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.abstract: Returns a boolean value for the given key.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:vE7SKTil.name: propertiesString
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:vE7SKTil.abstract: Returns a string representation of the node’s properties.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.name: keyValuePair(_:)
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html#/s:FE7SKTil.abstract: Parses a key/value string (separated byt ’=’) and returns a tuple.

Protocols/SKTiledObject.html.name: SKTiledObject
Protocols/SKTiledObject.html.abstract: The SKTiledObject protocol describes a generic Tiled object containing a dictionary of properties parsed from the TMX file.

Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html.name: SKTilemapDelegate
Protocols/SKTilemapDelegate.html.abstract: The SKTilemapDelegate protocol is used to implement a delegate that allows your application to interact with a tile map as it is being created.

Protocols/SKTiledSceneDelegate.html.name: SKTiledSceneDelegate
Protocols/SKTiledSceneDelegate.html.abstract: Delegate for managing SKTilemap nodes in an SKScene. This protocol and the SKTiledScene objects are included as a suggested way to use the SKTilemap class, but are not required.

Other Classes.html.name: Other Classes
Other Classes.html.abstract: The following classes are available globally.
